title: Strategies for Enhancing Fidelity of Autism Intervention via Mobile App-Based Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customized training design needed to enhance digital tool proficiency among special education teachers over 40, emphasizing field-applicable practice modules

learning_goals: Learners can execute NDBI intervention techniques with over 85% fidelity through mobile app-based training
Learners can apply three or more evidence-based intervention strategies appropriately in real classroom settings
Learners can analyze intervention performance results with 90% accuracy using digital self-assessment tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
